title: By hook or by crook
creator_credit: Russell Sefton and Christian Television Association of Victoria
brief_description: A film about early Christian Art examining the aesthetics and in particular, that of the catacombs of Rome. Pays special attention to the culltural-historical context from which it evolved. Presented by Barry Marshall.
